Update Firmware View More Finish Sign In Buy Station Claim Dismiss Yes No Scan QR Code Important Message Contact us Select Date> Read More Need more help? Contact Support Access to your location WeatherXM would like to know your location while using the app. This information will be used to provide more accurate information to you. Permission permanently denied Go to the app settings to give the required permissions. Cancelled! WeatherXM Requests Access to Bluetooth Login Forgot Password? Login with your email and your password to access your account. Already logged in. Explorer Devices Profile Network Statistics Claimed Active Weather Station-Days The amount of daily weather data generated by stations. One station generates one weather-station-day if it provides high quality data throughout the day. $WXM Rewards Station owners are rewarded in $WXM for providing data to the WeatherXM Network. Total Weather Stations The number of weather stations manufactured and registered on the network. Claimed Weather Stations The number of weather stations already claimed by users. Active Weather Stations The number of weather stations that were active during the last day. The average amount of tokens rewarded to a weather station in the last 30 days. Last Day Last Run Last 30 Days Join the weather revolution Earn %s $WXM/mo $WXM Token Deployed on Testnet - Read more here Total Supply Daily Minted Are you a station manufacturer? Join the ecosystem Last Updated on %s Total Search station name or address Recent Your search returned no results Try searching for something else or check for spelling mistakes. No recent search results Search for station name or address. Most recent results appear here. The search query must be at least 2 characters long. Go to your location Search error My Profile Total Earned Total Earned represents the sum of all tokens generated by your weather stations. It\'s the overall amount you\'ve earned since you started contributing data to WeatherXM. Total Claimed Total Claimed reflects the tokens you\'ve successfully claimed and withdrawn into your personal wallet. These are the rewards you\'ve converted from your earned tokens for personal use or other purposes. Allocated Rewards Νο allocated rewards yet! Preferences & Settings Set your preferences and app settings Start earning now! Join the weather revolution! Buy a weather station and start earning $WXM tokens. No wallet added yet! You are losing rewards! Connect your wallet to participate in our daily reward scheme. My Stations Weather Stations Claim your WXM device by clicking the + button. Claim your WXM device by clicking the + button or browse the map and add stations to your favorites. Just now No stations yet? View Explorer Map All displayed times are in %s timezone. Station Offline Unknown Address No Data We\’re unable to show updated station data. Please make sure your station is operational and connected to the internet. Observations Forecast Feels Like %s We\’re unable to show live station data. Please check back later for further updates. Station must be updated In order for your station to keep operating normally and receive $WXM rewards, you must update your station. Update Station Now Update Station Connecting to Station… Downloading Update… Update download in progress.
Do not switch off the Application! Make sure you don\'t move away from your station as you might lose Bluetooth connection! Installing Update… Connect to Station Download Firmware Update Install Firmware Update Station not in range We couldn\’t reach your station. Please make sure the station is powered up, and you are close enough for the Bluetooth connection to work. Station not yet paired In order to be able to update your station, you must first pair it via Bluetooth. To do so, please follow the instructions below. Tap the \"Pair Device\" button below. Station Updated Your station is updated to the latest Firmware! Update Failed Updating failed, please try again! If the problem persists, please contact our support team at support.weatherxm.com.

Please make sure to mention that you’re facing an Error %s for faster resolution. There is a brand new firmware update for your station.
We highly recommend you update, as this will improve the experience you’ll have with your WeatherXM station! We highly recommend you update, as this will improve the experience you’ll have with your WeatherXM station! New Update A new update of this app has been released. Please click the button below to go to Play Store and update the app.

After updating please restart the app. Continue without updating Update What\'s New: Password Reset Send Email Email has been sent! If your e-mail is registered with us you will receive instructions for resetting your password. Enter the email associated with your WeatherXM account and we will send you a password reset link. By deleting your account, you will no longer be eligible to gain $WXM rewards, and, you will no longer be able to view your station data in the WeatherXM apps. This will delete the following data:
• Your name.
• Your email address.
• Your station(s) details, their location, and their token rewards history This will not delete:
• The weather data you’ve shared with the network.
• The $WXM rewards you’ve collected. These are yours forever! We do not collect nor store any personal data! If you have any questions regarding your data and the deletion of your account, please contact our support team at support.weatherxm.com. I understand what deleting my WeatherXM account means. Deleting Account… Account Deleted We hate to see you go, and would like to hear why this happened.\n\nWe’d appreciate it if you could share your feedback with us! It will only take 5 minutes and will help us understand what went wrong! Deletion Failed Deletion failed, please try again! If the problem persists, please contact our support team at support.weatherxm.com.

Please make sure to mention that you’re facing an Error %s for faster resolution. Cancel Deletion Retry Deleting Account Validating Password… Take a Short Survey Confirm Password To Proceed Type your password Add Wallet Now Wallet Address is Missing! You haven\’t added a wallet yet. Thus, we will not be able to send you any $WXM rewards. It is highly recommended to use MetaMask, as it is the most compatible wallet. My Wallet Check compatibility here Wallet Compatibility Not sure if you own a $WXM compatible wallet? If your wallet is not compatible you may not be able to redeem or use $WXM rewards! Enter your wallet address Edit Wallet Address E.g., 0xDe1f*****B7F5 Create a MetaMask wallet here I acknowledge that I have ownership and full access to this wallet. I have read and accept the Terms of Service. Success: Address Saved. Save Wallet Address Confirm Wallet Ownership Please make sure you have the complete ownership of the Wallet ending in %1$s.\n\nIf you don\’t, you will lose all $WXM rewards from now on! In order to edit the Wallet Address you need to confirm you are the owner of this account.
Please type in your password to edit Wallet Address. IMPORTANT: During beta phase, $WXM token is deployed on testnet. Rewards will be recalculated and rewarded again after $WXM mainnet token launch. View Transaction History Sign Up Create Account Email * First Name Last Name Don\'t have an account? Signup with your email and your account will be created shortly. Thanks for joining WeatherXM! We have sent you an account activation link to %s. Please, set a password and then try to login. Not receiving an activation email? Contact our support team. Reward Timeline View Timeline Oh, no! No transactions yet? Rewards %s $WXM + %s $WXM Daily Reward Earnings for %s Base Reward Boosts No Active View Reward Details Weekly Streak Base reward scores from %1$s to %2$s %.2f N/A Reward Score A score from 0–1 (0–100%) which takes into account multiple factors in order to calculate the rewards you will earn on any given date. You can read more about these factors and our reward mechanism here. Max Rewards The maximum rewards you could earn in that reward distribution if you had a perfect 100% reward score. You can read more about our reward mechanism here. Problems Found Lost %s $WXM because of station problems. Did not earn any $WXM because of station problems. Some station problems found but did not lose any rewards. Identify & Fix Problems See Detailed Problems Got 100% Lost %d%% Timeline for %s (UTC) Timeline Timeline for the reference day of the actual rewards, as these are calculated taking into account the performance of the weather station for that day.

Note that all times and dates are in UTC, whereas this station is in the UTC%1$s timezone.

You can read more about our reward mechanism here. Timeline for the reference day of the actual rewards, as these are calculated taking into account the performance of the weather station for that day.

Note that all times and dates are in UTC.

You can read more about our reward mechanism here. Total Station Rewards Latest Last 7D Last 30D Reward Details Values out of bounds Some measurements (%s) were found to have out of bound values, compared to sensor specifications. This could be due to a faulty sensor or outdated firmware. Extreme spikes Abnormal spikes were detected in some weather measurements (%1$s). This could be due to a faulty sensor or bad deployment. Check our installation guide for more information about how to properly deploy your station. Abnormal spikes were detected in some weather measurements (%1$s). This could be due to a faulty sensor or bad deployment. Not enough data There seem to be gaps in the data of your station. This could be due to connection issues. Please, make sure that your station is properly connected. Read more on our troubleshooting guide. There seem to be gaps in the data of this station. This could be due to connection issues. No data Station sent no weather data in the aggregated time window. This could be due to connection issues, or your station’s batteries have run out. Please, make sure that your station is properly connected. No weather data found in the aggregated time window. Possible connection issues. Constant values Some weather measurements (%s) have not changed in the aggregated time window. This could be due to a faulty sensor or bad deployment. Read more on our troubleshooting guide. Some weather measurements (%s) have not changed in the aggregated time window. This could be due to a faulty sensor or bad deployment. Constant values Some weather measurements (%s) have not changed for 24 hours. This could be due to a faulty sensor or bad deployment. Read more on our troubleshooting guide. Some weather measurements (%s) have not changed for 24 hours. This could be due to a faulty sensor or bad deployment. Frozen sensor Could not measure wind speed, wind direction is constant and the temperature is below zero. Frozen sensor. Anomalous increase Anomalies were detected in some weather measurements (%1$s). This could be due to bad deployment, or sometimes due to faulty sensor. Check our installation guide for more information about how to properly deploy your station. Anomalies were detected in some weather measurements (%1$s). This could be due to bad deployment, or sometimes due to faulty sensor. Station reported a GPS location, but it is different from the location set during station claiming.

Your rewards are not yet affected by this error. However, unless this is resolved, they will be affected when Proof-of-Location goes live in the following weeks. Station did not report any GPS location in the aggregated time window. Make sure your station is properly deployed and the GPS antenna is connected. Check our installation guide for more information about how to properly deploy your station.

Your rewards are not yet affected by this error. However, unless this is resolved, they will be affected when Proof-of-Location goes live in the following weeks. Station did not report any GPS location in the aggregated time window. Make sure your station is properly deployed. Check our installation guide for more information about how to properly deploy your station.

Your rewards are not yet affected by this error. However, unless this is resolved, they will be affected when Proof-of-Location goes live in the following weeks. Location not verified Station reported a GPS location, but it is different from the location set during station claiming. No location Station did not report any GPS location in the aggregated time window. Station did not report any GPS location in the aggregated time window. Make sure your station is properly deployed and the GPS antenna is connected. Check our installation guide for more information about how to properly deploy your station. Station did not report any GPS location in the aggregated time window. Make sure your station is properly deployed. Check our installation guide for more information about how to properly deploy your station. No wallet In order to participate in our daily reward scheme you need to connect a wallet. This station did not receive any rewards because the owner has not added a wallet. Cell capacity reached Station excluded from rewards because the cell’s capacity was reached. You need to relocate your station to a different cell. Station excluded from rewards because the cell’s capacity was reached. Station relocated Station excluded from rewards because it was relocated from its initial location. PoL threshold not reached Station excluded from rewards because its Proof-of-Location (PoL) score was too low. This can happen if the station is not reporting any GPS data, or the GPS location doesn’t match the location set during claiming. Read more about the PoL algorithm. Station excluded from rewards because its Proof-of-Location (PoL) score was too low. QoD threshold not reached Station excluded from rewards because its Quality-of-Data (QoD) score was too low. This might be due to bad deployment or faulty sensors. Read more about the QoD algorithm. Station excluded from rewards because its Quality-of-Data (QoD) score was too low. Unidentified change Unidentified anomalies were detected in some weather measurements (%1$s). This could be due to bad deployment, or sometimes due to a faulty sensor. Check our installation guide for more information about how to properly deploy your station. Unidentified anomalies were detected in some weather measurements (%1$s). This could be due to bad deployment, or sometimes due to a faulty sensor Unidentified spikes Unidentified abnormal spikes were detected in some weather measurements (%1$s). This could be due to a faulty sensor or bad deployment. Check our installation guide for more information about how to properly deploy your station. Unidentified abnormal spikes were detected in some weather measurements (%1$s). This could be due to a faulty sensor or bad deployment. Unknown error There seems to be an unknown issue with your station. Please make sure you are running the latest version of our mobile app and your station is upgraded to the latest firmware. There seems to be an unknown issue with this station. Please make sure you are running the latest version of our mobile app. Minor issues slightly affected your rewards. This may happen occasionally, but we thought you should know. View reward details to identify and fix problems. Some issues prevent your station from getting the full rewards. View reward details to identify and fix problems. Serious problems were detected, that prevent the station from getting the full rewards. View reward details to identify and fix problems. Rewards Coming Soon! Your station hasn’t received any rewards yet. Sit back and relax, while our systems are validating the station’s location and data. You should start seeing rewards in the next couple of days. Claim Rewards Helium M5 We will need to access Bluetooth in order to utilise it in connecting and communicating to your WeatherXM Device. We will need to access your location in order to utilise it in connecting and communicating to your WeatherXM Device. Select Device to Pair Select your device from the list below. Scan Again No Bluetooth No Bluetooth found. Cannot proceed. Go to Settings and Grant Access Scanning for WeatherXM Devices No Location Access In order to connect your device, WeatherXM app needs access to Location. If you do not wish to provide such access, you will not be able to proceed with claiming your weather station. Bluetooth is not enabled In order to connect your device, WeatherXM app needs an enabled Bluetooth. If you do not wish to provide such access, you will not be able to proceed with claiming your weather station. No Bluetooth Access In order to connect your device, WeatherXM app needs access to Bluetooth. If you do not wish to provide such access, you will not be able to proceed with claiming your weather station. No Devices Found We could not find any WeatherXM devices, please try to scan again! Scanning Failed Something went wrong! Please Scan Again. Select your device type WS1000 | M5 Claim Device Manually WS2000 | Helium Claim Device via Bluetooth Device Serial Number Enter the device\'s serial number Device\'s serial number can be found in the M5 (shown after automatic reboot, or in the settings screen - swipe right to view). You can also find this information on the box of your station.

It is 18 characters long and looks like this: 12:34:56:78:9A:BC:DE:F0:12. Please type only the letters and numbers. Location of Installation Search for location Not yet, will install at a later time! Need help with proper weather station installation?
View our installation guide Your device will be claimed, but until you properly install it, it will not get any $WXM rewards.\n\nOnce you do so, you can enable your device by switching the toggle to “Installed and ready!” on your device details screen. Confirm and Proceed View Station Quit Claiming Retry Claiming Location I acknowledge that the deployment location above is correct and can be used to verify the eligibility of the station’s rewards. Set and Claim Station Claimed Claiming Station… Sit tight, we’re pairing your account with your WeatherXM device! This process could take up to 2 minutes due to the Helium\'s network bandwidth limitations! Your station is claimed under your account:
%s Connection Failed Something went wrong with the connection. Make sure you are near your weather station and retry claiming. If connection still fails, please unpair the station and restart the claiming process. For more details check our troubleshooting guide.

Alternatively, you can contact our support. Setting Station Frequency Rebooting Station Claiming Station Invalid Location Claim WS1000 Device Connection Verify Your Device I\'ve Connected My M5 Connect M5 via WiFi Open your phone\'s WiFi manager, and connect to the “WXM M5 XXX” network (this is your M5 device). After connecting to the M5, open your browser, and type 10.10.1.1 to view the available networks page. Choose the WiFi network you’d like to connect your M5 to and transmit data. If you\’re having difficulty completing this step, make sure you watch the instructional video below! Claim WS2000 Device Dev EUI Reset Station Reset Push the RESET button on the bottom of your WeatherXM device to enable Bluetooth pairing. This will expire in 5 minutes. After that, you will need to push it again to restart the pairing! Tap the \"I\'ve Reset My Device\" button below. Pairing Failed The Pairing process with WS2000 has failed. Please try again, and if the problem persists, contact support. Fetching device\'s info failed. Please try again, and if the problem persists, contact support. The Pairing process with WS2000 has failed. Bluetooth is disabled. Please enable it and try again. Connecting to WS2000 has failed. Connection Rejected. Please try again, and if the problem persists, contact support. Rebooting WS2000 has failed. Please try again, and if the problem persists, contact support. Frequency Given the location of installation you defined in the previous step, we\’ve selected the appropriate frequency for %s. Set Your Station\'s Frequency Recommended for %s Helium\'s LoRaWAN Network requires that you set your station\’s frequency for gateway configuration for the country you\’ve installed your station.

A list of the countries and their respective frequencies can be found here. I hereby acknowledge that the frequency selected above is the correct on for the country \’ve installed and will operate this station. Setting device\'s frequency failed. Please try again, and if the problem persists, contact support. Please make sure to mention that you’re facing an Error %s for faster resolution. Oops! No forecast weather data could not be found. History View Historical Data Oops! No weather data. Daily Precip. Precip. Rate Daily Rate Gust Speed Solar · No weather data found for your device for this day. No weather data found for your device for %s. Edit Name This friendly name is private. It will be visible only to you when you are logged in. Enter a new friendly name Short App Survey Thank you for your feedback! Improving your experience What we collect What we don\'t collect App Usage Data System version Personal data Identifying information You can always update your preferences in the app settings. To improve user experience in our apps, we are using analytics, for collecting crashes and other anonymous in-app events.
We do not collect ANY identifying information. Everything we collect will be used internally to improve your experience with WeatherXM. All data are anonymized! Station Settings Station’s Name Change Station’s Name Station\'s Frequency Change the frequency this station operates. To do this, make sure you’re close to your station, and that you’ve selected the appropriate frequency for your country.

A list of the countries and their respective frequencies can be found here. You must set your M5’s frequency to be the same as your station’s in order to receive and transmit data.

Setting the wrong frequency will result in loss of communication with your station, and will affect your $WXM rewards! Change Frequency Reboot Station This action will enable other devices to pair via bluetooth with the Station. Up to 7 devices can be paired with this station.\n\nUsing a previously paired device, get in proximity to your station, and tap the button below. Reconfigure WiFi Update M5’s WiFi network connection Remove Station Unclaim and remove this station from your account. You will not lose any allocated rewards, but you will not be able to view the station’s data or earn additional rewards in the future.
Learn more about it here. This action is not reversible! In order to remove your station you need to confirm you are the owner of this account.
Please type in your password to remove your station. Station Information Share Public Name (in Explorer) Hardware Version Firmware Version GPS - Number of connected satellites Last Hotspot Seen Last Tx RSSI WiFi Signal (RSSI) %s dBm Claimed at Battery Level Good Low We’ve detected that your station’s battery level is Low.
Please, replace the batteries as soon as possible, as this may affect your $WXM rewards and data. Station Rebooted Your station is rebooted.\nYou now have a 5 minutes window to pair the station with another device! Station can be paired with up to 7 devices. Back to settings Reboot Failed Station reboot failed, please try again! If the problem persists, please contact our support team at support.weatherxm.com.

Please make sure to mention that you’re facing an Error %s for faster resolution. Changing Frequency Given the location of your station, we\’ve selected the appropriate frequency for %s. Frequency Changed Your station’s frequency changed and it’s now %s. Frequency Change Failed Station frequency change failed, please try again! If the problem persists, please contact our support team at support.weatherxm.com.

Please make sure to mention that you’re facing an Error %s for faster resolution. Station Location The deployment location you set for this station is %s. If the location you see on the map doesn’t match the actual deployment location, press the button below to edit. The deployment location that the station owner has set is %s. Edit Location Alerts %s Issues The station is offline. Check that it has batteries and internet connection. If the problem persists, contact our support team at support.weatherxm.com Select Station for Widget Current Weather Current Weather Tile Current Weather Detailed You cannot add this widget if you do not own or follow a WXM weather station. Please sign in with your WeatherXM account to add a weather station widget. Please Sign In In order to see WeatherXM data, you need to be signed in. Select Station You need to select a station you own or follow. Share Station Add to favorites? %s seems offline at the moment. You can still add it to your favorites, but keep in mind that its data may not be correct. Remove from favorites? Are you sure you want to remove %s from your favorites list? Add weather station on your favorites to see historical & forecast data Parsing the URL failed Could not parse the requested URL. Invalid. Invalid URL. Multiple results returned that could not be parsed. Invalid URL. No results returned. See something wrong? Contact Support Hidden Content Add %s to your favorites to see historical & forecast data. Login to add %s to your favorites to see historical & forecast data. Edit Station Location Editing the station’s location is subject to a relocation penalty and the station will be excluded from rewards for the next 2 days.
Read more here Confirm Location Location Confirmed! Your station’s location has been updated. The station should start earning rewards again when your location is verified by our systems in ~2–3 days.
